term.title: separation factor

item.text: The ratio of the respective distribution ratios of two extractable solutes measured under the same conditions.

notes.item: By convention the solutes designated as A and B in the above are chosen so as to make α > 1.
The term separation coefficient is not recommended.
The terms selectivity coefficient and selectivity ratio are not synonymous and should not be used.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2373. 'Nomenclature for liquid-liquid distribution (solvent extraction) (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2386 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365112373)
